title: Enhancing Clinical Competencies: Advanced Practice Skills via Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaborative learning theory, understanding of social interaction, and experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design effective role allocation and collaboration processes using CSCL platforms
Learners can develop three or more discussion scenarios that promote social interaction in an online environment.
Learners can present measurable indicators of collaborative learning outcomes based on project-based assessment criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
